items.title: Enterprise Marketplace Modernization (Anonymized)
items.summary: Re-platformed a multi-surface marketplace experience with clear ownership boundaries, measurable delivery improvements, and governance-minded controls.
items.context: PLACEHOLDER: 2–3 lines describing the org context and constraints (legacy integrations, multi-team environment, customer-facing surface area).
items.businessProblem: PLACEHOLDER: What was at risk (time-to-market, quality, support burden, stakeholder confidence, etc.).
myOwnership: PLACEHOLDER: Owned delivery plan, cross-team alignment, and release readiness gate.
PLACEHOLDER: Managed risks and clarified decision rights across stakeholders.
technicalApproach: PLACEHOLDER: Modular front-end + API boundary refinement.
PLACEHOLDER: Observability and reliability KPIs added to delivery.
leadershipDecisions: PLACEHOLDER: Chose sequencing to de-risk production cutover.
PLACEHOLDER: Introduced governance checkpoint for AI-facing features.
impact: PLACEHOLDER: Reduced cycle time by X%.
PLACEHOLDER: Improved defect escape rate by Y%.
governanceRisk: PLACEHOLDER: PII handling and logging policy review.
PLACEHOLDER: Guardrails and human-in-loop approvals for sensitive actions.

items.title: AI Governance Gate: 60–90 Minute Mini-Audit (Anonymized)
items.summary: Built a repeatable governance checkpoint that catches privacy/safety gaps before launch and creates a lightweight risk register.
items.context: PLACEHOLDER: LLM/RAG feature approaching launch; compliance review arrived late in the cycle.
items.businessProblem: PLACEHOLDER: Risk of shipping without bias/privacy safeguards and retention clarity.
myOwnership: Defined the governance checkpoint and success criteria (fast, repeatable, auditable).
Aligned engineering + compliance on what is 'good enough' before launch.
technicalApproach: Red-team prompt set (15–20 prompts) for bias/safety.
Checked logging for PII capture; validated retention settings.
Documented risks + mitigations; scheduled the next governance gate.
leadershipDecisions: Chose a lightweight gate to avoid slowing delivery while increasing safety.
Made the gate non-negotiable for future releases.
impact: PLACEHOLDER: Detected N issues before launch.
PLACEHOLDER: Reduced rework by X hours/sprint.
governanceRisk: Data retention and audit logging clarity.
Bias/safety testing as a release requirement.
